ABOUT COMPANY: Japanese toy and computer games company founded in 1958 which is best known for manufacturing Barcode Battler and Doraemon video games, Aquabeads, and the Sylvanian Families series of toys. Its current Representative President is Michihiro Maeda.

In 1961, Aoshima Bunka Kyozai Inc. was established, developing and manufacturing plastic model kits. Aoshima has continued to grow since, and has become one of the leading manufacturers of plastic model kits in Japan.
